title: avAng manasa
sahitya:
avAng manasa gOcaram shankaram haram bhajata manujA bhavaharam


anupallavi

  bhavAni mAnasAra vinda bhAskaram krpAkaram puraharam


caraNam    anAtyantama janIm praNatArtti haram hari virincArcita sharaNam
sanAtanam candra kalAdharam niTila nEtram bhasmO dhULitagAtram
